verses.verse: We then,<WG1161> as workers together<WG4903> with him, beseech<WG3870> you also<WG2532> that ye<WG5209> receive<WG1209> not<WG3361> the<WG3588> grace<WG5485> of God<WG2316> in<WG1519> vain.<WG2756>

But <WG235> in<WG1722> all<WG3956> things approving<WG4921> ourselves<WG1438> as<WG5613> the ministers<WG1249> of God,<WG2316> in<WG1722> much<WG4183> patience,<WG5281> in<WG1722> afflictions,<WG2347> in<WG1722> necessities,<WG318> in<WG1722> distresses,<WG4730>

By <WG1722> pureness,<WG54> by<WG1722> knowledge,<WG1108> by<WG1722> longsuffering,<WG3115> by<WG1722> kindness,<WG5544> by<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Ghost,<WG4151> by<WG1722> love<WG26> unfeigned,<WG505>

As <WG5613> unknown,<WG50> and<WG2532> yet well known;<WG1921> as<WG5613> dying,<WG599> and,<WG2532> behold,<WG2400> we live;<WG2198> as<WG5613> chastened,<WG3811> and<WG2532> not<WG3361> killed;<WG2289>

As <WG5613> sorrowful,<WG3076> yet<WG1161> always<WG104> rejoicing;<WG5463> as<WG5613> poor,<WG4434> yet<WG1161> making many rich;<WG4148> <WG4183> as<WG5613> having<WG2192> nothing,<WG3367> and<WG2532> yet possessing<WG2722> all things.<WG3956>
O ye Corinthians,<WG2881> our<WG2257> mouth<WG4750> is open<WG455> unto<WG4314> you,<WG5209> our<WG2257> heart<WG2588> is enlarged.<WG4115>
Ye are not<WG3756> straitened<WG4729> in<WG1722> us,<WG2254> but<WG1161> ye are straitened<WG4729> in<WG1722> your own<WG5216> bowels.<WG4698>
Now <WG1161> for a recompense<WG489> in the<WG3588> same, I<WG846> (speak<WG3004> as<WG5613> unto my children,)<WG5043> be ye<WG5210> also<WG2532> enlarged.<WG4115>

Be <WG1096> ye not<WG3361> unequally yoked together<WG2086> with unbelievers:<WG571> for<WG1063> what<WG5101> fellowship<WG3352> hath righteousness<WG1343> with<WG2532> unrighteousness?<WG458> and<WG1161> what<WG5101> communion<WG2842> hath light<WG5457> with<WG4314> darkness?<WG4655>
And <WG1161> what<WG5101> concord<WG4857> hath Christ<WG5547> with<WG4314> Belial?<WG955> or<WG2228> what part<WG3310> hath he that believeth<WG4103> with<WG3326> an infidel?<WG571>

And <WG1161> what<WG5101> agreement<WG4783> hath the temple<WG3485> of God<WG2316> with<WG3326> idols?<WG1497> for<WG1063> ye<WG5210> are<WG2075> the temple<WG3485> of the living<WG2198> God;<WG2316> as<WG2531> God<WG2316> hath said,<WG2036> I will dwell<WG1774> in<WG1722> them,<WG846> and<WG2532> walk in<WG1704> them; and<WG2532> I will be<WG2071> their<WG846> God,<WG2316> and<WG2532> they<WG846> shall be<WG2071> my<WG3427> people.<WG2992>
